ygData.subject: Re: lang list
ygData.msgSnippet: I have seen aviaks, I know the young ones and the chicks tend to be in the Bucherblock mountains.
ygData.messageBody:
I have seen aviaks, I know the young ones and the chicks tend to be in the Bucherblock
mountains.


On Friday, May 14, 1999 2:36 AM, Steven Zaharakis [SMTP:sz200@...] wrote:
> From: Steven Zaharakis <sz200@...>
>
>
> I would assume there is aviak and centaur, but I have yet to see any (even
> though these creatures exist in game).
>
> Zolthar
>
> At 11:03 PM 5/13/99 -0400, you wrote:
> >From: Tony Williams <vincedis@...>
> >
> >Thanks everyone that replied last time around
> >This is my new and improved list. any more additions and hey you digest
> people you can respond too yanno. I'm in
> >the process of getting some info together to make a web page so I'm trying
> to get it as complete as possible.
> >thanks again
> >
> >Tony
